mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(user_id, pwd, name, sido, gugun, dong, address, zip_num, email, birth_date, phone) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{sido}, #{gugun}, #{dong}, #{address}, #{zip_num}, #{email}, #{birth_date}, #{phone})
mapper.delete: DELETE users SET dropyn='y' WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET dropyn = 'y' WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%'
SELECT pwd FROM users WHERE user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT user_id, address, dropyn, name, phone FROM (SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY name desc) rn, user_id, address, dropyn, name, phone FROM users WHERE user_id LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%') WHERE rn > (#{criteria.pageNum}-1) * #{criteria.rowsPerPage} AND rn <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.rowsPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE user_id LIKE '%'||#{key}||'%'
